posts.message:
Download all messages between you and a friend from facebook

that was a little hard, getting all messages between you and a friend
require that you know the thread ID, so i had to grab all your latest messages
from inbox and prompt the user to choose one of them and tell me the ID

next i faced a weired problem : Facebook Graph documentation is outdated and 
each time i get a request i can' access information the right way, so i had
to inspect and use IRB step by step to get it done.

the third problem was that facebook treat messages as posts, so the first time
you send a message to a friend is a post and all the other messages are comments
T_T that made me cry, after getting all comments i had to get the original message
in a separate request.

that was a harder script than i thought, but here we are, finished and ready for 
you to have fun with ;)

Gist: https://gist.github.com/9706660

كلام غريب لازم يتقال ويتناقش 
ان العرب مبيعملوش برامج ترتقى لفكرة التسويق 
ان مستقبل المبرمج فى مصر والوطن العربى مبنى على فكرتين 
1-mobile application 
2-web designer or developer 
 but in Egypt we do them in the same time 
ان مجال البرمجة فى مصر لسة موصلش انك تكون software engineers 
ـــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــــ
حاجة تانية شخصية 
انا لم دخلت المجال متاح قدامى جزئيتين 
1-networking
2-computer science 
I asked a lot of programmers in both field .all advised me to do what i like so to determine the different I have taken a course in 
1-MCSA for networking 
2-Java for mobile application 
I now Disappointed as i love the both field i don't know what i should do 
please advise me 
والحجات اللى بتكرهنى فى مجال البرمجة 
ان شخص متخرج يقولى 
مرتبات المبرمجين ضعيفة 
احنا بنعمل برامج للاجانب بس 
انا عنفسى كلمتيت زى اللى اتقلولى تخلينى ادمر نفسيا 
الصراحة مش عارف اقرر لانى مش عايز اضيع وقت 
والحمد لله انى لسة 19 سنة

High-Level Competition (Kaggle) - Awesome prizes & more...!

During my master thesis, i was discovering deep learning (DL) concept and found out that Geoffrey Hinton (ML pioneer) is a professor at University of Toronto and also researcher at Google due to its distinguished work on DL, he always talks about how his PhD students can easily win kaggle competitions using DL

let's try going dirty and find out how real problems solve!!

References:
* Kaggle competitions (http://www.kaggle.com/competitions)
* Kaggle Ranking (http://www.kaggle.com/users)
* Hinton webpage (https://www.cs.toronto.edu/~hinton/)
* Hinton & Google (http://www.wired.com/wiredenterprise/2014/01/geoffrey-hinton-deep-learning/)

* Some stories and articles about Kaggle
http://blog.kaggle.com/2013/05/06/qa-with-job-salary-prediction-first-prize-winner-vlad-mnih/
http://blog.kaggle.com/2013/04/29/qa-with-vlado-boza-2nd-place-winner-job-salary-prediction-competition/
http://readwrite.com/2012/04/12/what-you-can-learn-from-kaggle#awesm=~ozhlOUbd1bMjHl
http://plotting-success.softwareadvice.com/who-are-the-kaggle-big-data-wizards-1013/

Hi Geeks,
Can anyone recommend a good mobile internet carrier? I know mobinil, vodafone and etisalat are all crap and overpriced, but out of the 3 which one will be more usable in terms of speed and coverage? Also, do all 3 carriers block VoIP services such as skype?
